rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area with integrated Scandinavian aesthetics, featuring clean lines and natural materials.
Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, designed with modern Scandinavian functionality and ample storage.
Dedicated dining area integrated within the open-plan layout, with space for wheelchair maneuverability.
Accessible entrance hall leading directly into the living area, designed to be wide for wheelchair access.

openings.description: Primary entrance door with automatic opening mechanism to aid accessibility.
Secondary access door, integrated into open-plan layout for emergency exits.

vastu_considerations.correction: Incorporate east-facing windows in living and dining areas to balance energy.
